mapper.insert: insert into pj_api_group (parent_id, ancestors, `name`, order_num, project_id) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ancestors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into pj_api_group
parent_id,
ancestors,
`name`,
order_num,
project_id,
#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{ancestors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update pj_api_group
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ancestors = #{ancestors,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pj_api_group set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ancestors = #{ancestors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into pj_api_group (parent_id, ancestors, `name`, order_num, project_id) values
(#{item.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.ancestors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select ifnull(max(order_num),0) from pj_api_group where parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from pj_api_group where project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by parent_id, order_num

select
from pj_api_group where parent_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by order_num
